title: One to Take
description: A STAND-ALONE NOVEL in the “One to Hold” universe. Prepare for strong language, panty-melting sexy times, and heart-squeezing angst. Readers 18 and older only, please.Stuart Knight is a wounded Marine turned Sexy Cowboy. Mariska Heron is the gypsy girl who stole his heart. Now they’re fighting for their Happily Ever After…Life is never simple.Even perfect couples face storms.The question is whether our love is strong enough to survive.I believe it is.She told me to leave.If I leave, I take her with me.~Stuart Knight#SexyCowboy#BelieveOn Pinterest: http://bit.ly/1IwacnWOn Spotify: http://spoti.fi/1QPSbZR
author: Tia Louise
